components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to To and From Multiple Small Networks In United States of America and Guam

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to and from multiple small networks in the United States of America and Guam. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to and from multiple small networks in the United States of America and Guam. incidents.name: Call Quality Issue to a Subset to Twilio Phone Number in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate outbound call quality issues from a subset of Twilio's Phone Numbers in Brazil. Our engineering team is working with our carrier partners to resolve this. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Arab Emirates SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the United Arab Emirates is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 December 2025 at 10:30 PST until 09 December 2025 at 16:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to United Arab Emirates handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States MMS Carrier Maintenance - Verizon

incident_updates.body:
The Verizon network in the United States is conducting an emergency maintenance from 09 December 2025 at 19:00 PST until 11 December 2025 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from Verizon United States handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 December 2025 at 21:00 PST until 10 December 2025 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - SoftBank Mobile

incident_updates.body:
The SoftBank Mobile network in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 December 2025 at 07:00 PST until 11 December 2025 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to SoftBank Mobile Japan handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 December 2025 at 07:00 PST until 10 December 2025 at 13:00 PST
11 December 2025 at 07:00 PST until 11 December 2025 at 13:00 PST

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia and the Philippines is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 December 2025 at 12:00 PST until 10 December 2025 at 17:59 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays to Twilio Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia and Philippines phone numbers.

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 December 2025 at 16:00 PST until 11 December 2025 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 December 2025 at 12:00 PST until 29 December 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

01 December 2025 at 12:00 PST until 01 December 2025 at 16:00 PST
